name: Journey Map Template with Auto Layout!
description:
Sick of having to create a Journey Map template from scratch? Tired of templates that don't line up with ease? Fear no more, Super Auto Layout is here to save the day!


Gone are the days of worry about typing freely and having to resize the container! Gone are the days of having to re-align visual assets next to text. Here is a journey map template with auto layout!


Not familiar with auto layout? Check out this short video! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PNJxeD29ZTg


Liked this template? Be sure to share this on LinkedIn and tag me!

This Figma file link: https://www.figma.com/community/file/1097030011825489559/Journey-Map-Template-with-Auto-Layout!

My LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/adrianye

https://www.figma.com/community/file/881830156311997001/UX-Persona-Template

Thanks for viewing, liking, or duplicating!!
